1.0.0.name: wordpress/quantity-boxes
1.0.0.description:
Lets to display an increment and a decrement button next to inputs of type number in Mozzilla and MSIE.

It can be use in any WordPress installation, although, he has created for eCommerces created with TheCartPress

Unlimited features

  • Quantity Boxes is compatible with TheCartPress and has been developed by TheCartPress Team.
